Author: Pinny
Title: How To Deliver The Right Message At The Right Time

Author: Darmani
Content: Economists have predicted nine out of the last five recessions.

Author: edw519
Content: This kind of thing persists for the same reason as spam, because, sometimes, it works.  They will only stop when "everyone" stops enabling.

Author: tarkin2
Content:
Perhaps it's a British thing but I wouldn't have paid the thief either. It seems like doing such would perpetuate this activity. It's far more moralistic than pragmatic, but I guess he and I value those more than monetary benefits.

I would only pay him if I was sure I could successfully bring criminal proceedings against him - otherwise I would have done what this man did: refused to perpetuate this criminal activity and wrote about my experiences to warn others and therefore ultimately damage this kind of activity through awareness.

Author: Xichekolas
Content:
I think you just found a new idea for a startup... you are guaranteed a Series A round with that kind of thinking!

Seriously, you should contact my agent in Kenya for your $4,000,000 check. For a small fee of $10,000 you can have his phone number.
